website_summaries.verdict: An affordable hand-held sprayer than can convert your toilet into a bidet with minimal effort.
pros: Durable water sprayer attachment that is compatible with most toilets
Has buttons that are easy to access and allow you to control water pressure to suit your needs
Doubles as sink, tub, and toilet cleaning tool and can be used to rinse cloth diapers
cons: Leaking around the sprayer head has been reported
Some owners express concerns about durability

customer_reviews.title: Savings begin
customer_reviews.text: So finally i decided to try this one, after reading out ways to save on toilet paper trust me my toilet paper usage is already cut into half because you dont have to wipe again and again the good thing about this is it's really easy to install, i just had to use my hands nothing else and it really works good the pressure is adjustable so no worries
customer_reviews.author: Saad Awais

customer_reviews.title: It worked...for 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I got this handheld bidet and i was super excited to use it. I've always wanted one every since i could remember. The installation was easy. It was easy to use. The instructions stated that I turn it "on" when i want to use it and turn it "off" when I'm not. Thats exactly what I did but, for some reason, after about 3 weeks, I've been coming home to a wet floor because water keeps leaking out of the toilet/bidet connection. I tried fixing it and waiting it out for another week or so but the problem is persistent. I have no choice but to uninstall it. Its very annoying because i can't even return it at this point.
customer_reviews.author: F.I.

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Like A Spring Day
customer_reviews.text: I’m not really good with putting devices together, but this one was pretty easy. It works very well. I have to say that the water comes out a little cold but otherwise it does a great job. I really like that I can control the water pressure. Perfect for cleaning unmentionable areas after a sweaty workout.
customer_reviews.author: Metro Dude

customer_reviews.title: Beware. Questionable quality. Lousy instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Changing previous 5 star. Just over 30 days and casting that attaches to bottom of tank started leaking. A pin hole in the casting has opened up and flooded my floor. Closing the the accompanying valve doesn't help since the leak is before that. Since I'm just beyond the 30 day window for returning the product, there's no option available to contact Amazon or seller. I'll have to remedy this myself. If I had to bring in a plumber or had a wood floor I'd be really screwed.
customer_reviews.author: Mikengrcty

customer_reviews.title: Leaks a Huge Stream!
customer_reviews.text: We installed this today and found that you can only turn it on after you've already got the sprayer under you because as soon as you turn the valve into the "on" position, the sprayer head start leaking like an actual bathroom faucet until you turn the valve back to the "off" position! The force of spray is fine and gets you clean, but expect to have a mess to clean up on your floor after each use. Sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: The Humble Food Snob

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order this product
customer_reviews.text: The adaptor they had would not fit my connection s. They have only 1 size 5/16. Mine is 1/2 inch. So I had to go buy another adaptor at 14 dollars. It should come in the box for both sizes. I am Gonna return and order another one that would fit. No number to call on the box have to go through amazon. Terrible don’t buy it
customer_reviews.author: armen tatevossian

customer_reviews.title: Defective within second use!
customer_reviews.text: The product received was easy to install. However, after second use of the sprayer, the handheld portion of the sprayer started leakign. The push lever did not stop the flow of water even when released. Tried to shut it on and off. Not a good quality product when it's defective within second use.
customer_reviews.author: utsav v patel

customer_reviews.title: Price Gouged
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I really do, I have nothing negative to say about it as it concerns usage. But, and this is a big but, they price gouged during the early stages of the coronavirus pandemic. The price we paid for this product was approximately $100 USD. The price as I am writing this, approximately less than a month later is around $40 USD. Now I highly suggest you buy this product for the environmental and hygienic benefits; but when you do buy it, just know that they are shysters.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Virus Price hike
customer_reviews.text: Was $27 in January when I bought then returned due to low water pressure in my bathroom...this is unethical pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product. Leaky leaky leaky.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was fairly simple- it took about ten minutes. However after installing, it leaked in multiple spots. I tightened it perfectly so definitely not user error. I tried to patch the lead with the crappy plumbers tape they included but no dice. The fact that they even included the tape suggests to me they know leaking is a problem with this product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rainer

customer_reviews.title: Totally needed
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far. I received the product and didn’t really read the instructions well. I initially though you attach the t valve to the valve on the wall. However that was incorrect. You need to remove the valve from the tank. Just follow the instructions, not like me. So far it’s connected and working fine. They even provide plumbers tape for those who don’t have it. So far I didn’t need it. Everything looks sleek and nice. The hose is a bit leaky itself and I can’t find the problem. Maybe I need some plumbers tape somewhere. All your tools are supplied with the kit. Overall looks great! I’ll update if anything else is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: FozziEEE

customer_reviews.title: Heck yeah!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! I don’t know why I waited so long to buy this thing. Maybe I am too slow because I did not find it easy to install at all. It certainly did not take me under 10 mins. However, once installed, I was sooooo please. Like, I am experiencing joy like you wouldn’t believe. The freshness! Oh the freshness. The stream! Yoohooo! The holder doesn’t seat firmly on the tank but who the heck cares? The fact that I am having no drip/leaking issues is another plus.
customer_reviews.author: NYC

customer_reviews.title: Sorry home depot
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie. I was skeptical. Many brands out there. And home depot didnt have one at this price. I was already sold on the price. Packaging was neat and secured. Nothing is flopping around. Install was super easy. Only thing i didnt use in the kit was the white tape. I have a go-to brand for that. Other than that, product is cool. I dont have problems with it. It works great at an awesome price
customer_reviews.author: Kapllia

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: A must have! I wanted a bidet where the spray part was not located in the toilet because I felt that was not sanitary. After trying this one I was hooked! This spray is definitely worth the money. I bought 2. Don’t think twice about getting this product. Very easy to install. And thank you to the gentleman named Scott that shared a video. That video helps me to increase or decrease the pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: No kidding this really works!
customer_reviews.text: I would love an expensive TOTO bidet type toilet but that's not in the cards. So I thought, for this low price might as well give it a shot. And it works! It wasn't easy for me to install but it was a snap for my nice neighbor because he's young and could get down on the floor to connect it properly. I'm sure it would have been easy for me 20 years ago! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Richard Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, easy to install and works great. So far (almost 1 month since installation) happy with this purchase. Had installed another Bidet few months ago that costs twice the price of this product. This product has been working well similar to the product that costs twice. Planning to buy one more of this for the 3rd bath/toilet in my home. :)
customer_reviews.author: FourS

customer_reviews.title: Yes, Please.
customer_reviews.text: It took some time getting used to the ice cold water coming out of the pipes, but now I can’t remember life dependent solely on TP. Setup was super easy - took less than 20 minutes. No missing pieces, no heavy tool use... just a screw driver. The hose length is just right if you hang it on the side of the toilet that the water outlet is. Water pressure is super variable. I bought this spray set and another brand. They are very similar. The difference was in the instructions provided. And unfortunately I can’t remember now which one was which... but one of the instruction sets were worthless. I had to follow the other set for installation.
customer_reviews.author: GLJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect and adjustable water pressure
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought one of these for my main bathroom for my girlfriend and I to use. it took me about 15 minutes to hook up and I tried it and appreciated it's performance. it was nice to be able to adjust the water pressure. My girlfriend comes from a country where these are commonly used and really liked it as well. So I bought 2 more for other bathrooms and my girlfriend and her family purchased several for their homes. they are very good quality and the wand has a long hose to ensure ease of use. I will continue to recommend these bidets. Great quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT S

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought this earlier!
customer_reviews.text: Omg i LOVE my bidet! Im so happy I got it. It was easy to install and I've never installed anything in my life, so if I could figure it out, you will too! Lol. My bathroom is so small I was afraid it would be too big for the area where my toilet is but it's not! It's the perfect size. Super slick looking and its actually rather inconspicuous. Im so happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia M

customer_reviews.title: I’m unsure if this product will suit the needs I have.
customer_reviews.text: It took me two attempts to install because with the first attempt I had a small leak going. I used two rubber washers at the tank connection and more plumbers tape the second time around and that seemed to fix the leak. The sprayer doesn’t seem to be very strong at all which is disappointing since I intend to use it for cleaning diapers into the toilet. I’m hoping it’s something I can fix, because if not then I’ll be looking for another sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Easy installment and works well, comes with everything you need
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with this. I installed it so easily and quickly. Less than 10 minutes. I have nerve damage in my hands but I was still able to install it. It comes with the white tape and a little tool to tighten as well. The water is cold of course but that’s ok. I tried it out already and it leaves me with such a clean feeling. I’m looking forward to saving on toilet paper. It will also make cleaning the toilet easier I think. Great product so far. I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Neutrino

customer_reviews.title: Why don’t more people use these?
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Only downside is that it is only for cold water hookups, unless you have warm water going into your toilet ( which I knew when I bought it!) The first few times it’s freezing and I never thought I would get used to it, but now I don’t even think about it. I don’t know why some people think it’s weird to own one of these. Super clean every time you go! I think when I upgrade, I’ll buy one with the option of hot and cold water hookups, but those take a lot more to install. This one is super easy to install - it only took my husband 5 minutes. Good quality, too!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: The trick to install preventing the leak
customer_reviews.text: It was a straightforward install but then I experience leaking after turning on the valve. I watched youtube videos to ensure I ain’t missing anything. Until I found the answer from one of the post that said that you have to include the white rubber before the black washer inside the T-valve. After numerous attempts it stopped the leaked! I also used the plumber’s tape on the fill valve of the toilet to ensure the fit and be leak free! So far been using it for days and not experiencing any leak while the lever is on 45 degrees angle. The step isn’t stated in the given documentation that came in the box.
customer_reviews.author: lem

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you tighten up the connection part between the tank and the hose.
customer_reviews.text: The first one they sent did not work(leaking),but the seller quickly sent a replacement which works now. The trick is you really have to get the nut that connects to the water tank to be super tight. The nut is rounded that makes it super hard to use the wrench to tighten it, especially in a small space. For us there is very little space between the toilet and the wall, and it almost makes it impossible to turn the wrench in some angles. It would be great of the manufacturer can make a normal six sided nut that the wrench would be able to turn in any angle. It works great after successfully installed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Bidet
customer_reviews.text: Good materials for the spray head. My only issue is the hose. It will rust in time. Only wish they can make a set with the same spray head but plastic hose for durability. This is by far the easiest one to install and no leak upon first installation.
customer_reviews.author: Von

customer_reviews.title: Slow leak
customer_reviews.text: I finally connected my bidet. I bought it in December but I did not have the time to connect it. It was easy following the steps. Once connected, it leaks a slow leak. I can’t get it replaced and I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Literally the first thing we bought at the start of the pandemic
customer_reviews.text: We knew with all of the dorks buying up toilet paper like they were going to stop making it that we weren't going to be chained to supply and demand. It's literally a kitchen sprayer and not fancy but it powerwashes what needs to be tended to. Do NOT leave it on all of the time or you could end up with the water issues some people had. Turn on the water valve before you know you're going to use it and after when you're April fresh. (Oh and wipe it down afterward, you're not an animal.)
customer_reviews.author: CoveGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sprayer, easy to install, no leaks
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this Achiotely sprayer is of good quality, good looking, and working well - No leaks. I'm not a handy man but it took me only 15 min to install. I have used several other-brand bidet sprayers over the past 7 years, and this Achiotely sprayer is the easiest to install. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great for cloth diapers and your booty
customer_reviews.text: I love this sprayer/bidet! It was easy for my husband to install. I like that is has a switch to turn the water off in case you have a child that might want to play with it. The stream can be strong if you push down all the way, great for spraying poo off of cloth diapers. The stream can also be weak for your booty as a bidet. I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Nini U.

customer_reviews.title: Breeze to install, works.
customer_reviews.text: Achiotely Handheld Bidet was easy to install and seemed like a quality product. Installation was quick and no leaks or surprises. The only thing that would have made this perfect world be to not have to shutoff the valve after every use. But all the models I looked at had the same restriction.
customer_reviews.author: Cluttered Mind

customer_reviews.title: Feel fresh instead of a hot mess!
customer_reviews.text: As a women we have days where you just feel like multiple showers in a day is the only way to feel clean (monthly visitor) - I get an upset stomach during that time as well (TMI sorry) but it makes those days especially tedious and this has changed the game for me! Being able to rinse off after using the bathroom is sooo much better than just using plain toilet paper. I don’t feel gross and feel much better between showers. Highly recommend this to anyone who likes feeling clean.
customer_reviews.author: Confidential87

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, helps hygiene
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely what I was looking for - we always had these in India for ages, was wondering why they are so rare in the US - washing is far more clean than using tissues! Great product quality, very easy to install (does not require any tools) - takes just 5 minutes to set up and haven't observed any leaks half an hour after installing.
customer_reviews.author: Sunil Ayalasomayajula

customer_reviews.title: Complete kit, ready to install.
customer_reviews.text: The kit comes with everything that you need to complete the installation on a standard toilet. It even included tools and mounting anchors. Everything is made from nice quality material. Operation is smooth and provides a pleasent and sanity stream of water. Hose has a good length to make it usable, bit doesn't kink or get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Good product as advertized.
customer_reviews.text: This product seems well made. And easy to install with all tools provided. However, take into consideration the temperature of you tap cold water. It can be a little cold on your backside. You way want to opt for a one that has a hot water line and a temperature adjustment as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eye Shot First

customer_reviews.title: This is a game changer
customer_reviews.text: I am a female and when I ordered this I worried. I was like 'omg is this going to be like a water hose spraying at my nether regions' and I fretted and wondered if maybe I shouldn't have bought it. Installation was a breeze (Don't forget to use the tape and don't tighten it too much!) and the water is cold but holy cow. It gets things so much cleaner and fresher. What's more? It's NOT like a water hose at all! The pressure is adjustable! Gentle spray.
customer_reviews.author: Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect
customer_reviews.text: The installation was a breeze and the instructions were clear and concise. Two minor issues: 1- The O ring on the handle is too big to fit in the cradle me 2- The supplied screws are too short of you want to fix the cradle to the wall. They need to be 1/2" longer.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been my whole
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install that a B- student can connect this booty cleaner in less than ten. The sparky can be intense which I like so I can really clean the crack front to back. I love how long the cord is so I can really reach. Can leave you a little wet though.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Jolie

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a bidet last year before the pandemic really got bad in the US. It was meant to be. A few months later, when toilet paper was more valuable than gold and nowhere to be found, I had my wonderful bidet. I installed it myself and it was really easy to follow the instructions. I really like that you can adjust the strength of the water. Yes, it shoots cold water, but it really isn’t bad.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: It leaks and it’s plastic.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited by the simplicity described the so many great uses. Then I was disappointed when I installed. It leaked in multiple places on the t-connection and then it leaked from the hand sprayer too. I disassembled twice and installed it three times to make sure it wasn’t screwing it up. But nothing changed. The metal edges are sharp and the t-connection is plastic. Do not waste your money. HARD PASS!
customer_reviews.author: ArmanRVA

customer_reviews.title: Ditch your toilet paper & tabo!
customer_reviews.text: This is it pancit! Wag ka na magtabo. Wag ka na magsayang ng pera sa toilet paper. I got this right before all the COVID-19 panic buying and stay-at-home orders and lockdowns. I was so grateful for the great timing. We got it in just one week without Amazon Prime. PERFECT! Installation took a mere 10 minutes for two toilets/bidets. It is so easy to use, even my 4-year-old loves it and can use it by herself.
customer_reviews.author: Bia RL

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Comes with Teflon tape as well as a wrench. Material seems to be robust with the t valve made of brass and the bidet head made of stainless steel. The weak point may be the trigger. The only thing I didn't like was the bracket that hooks on to the cistern. The lid doesn't sit flush its as though the bend is too wide. Apart from that the experience has been fantastic
customer_reviews.author: A812

customer_reviews.title: Easy tu setup and use, but I wish it was more durable.
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks of use the main valve that goes under the toilet doesn't stop the water flow completely, now there's always pressure on the hose while is not in use, making prone to leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Wilfredo Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: 1st bidet, Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I'm shocked that the price is as low as it is. I had some trouble installing. I ended up having to replace my hose (unrelated to this product). Also, I realized that the plastic ends have to be removed before installing. Since installing, this has been a great addition to my bathroom. I can't imagine a standalone bidet being more useful or convenient than this.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Diaper Sprayer; Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this sprayer for a little over a month and it is working great with no leaks. We are using it as a diaper sprayer and the pressure adjustment has worked well. The hook to hold it on does not feel like it will last but is holding up so far. Installation was very easy, too. I learned with our last sprayer that after turning off the water supply for the sprayer each time you use it, it helps to expel the leftover water in the tube to relieve pressure and prevent leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for someone not sure they want a bidet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this because it is there when I need it and find I use it daily. I like that it remains separate from the toilet seat. I had to get a plumber to install due to my toilet's plumbing, but it was quick and cheap to do it correctly. I don't mind the water temperature (tap cold). You can adjust the pressure by the amount of pressure applied to nozzle. It really has multiple uses other than personal cleaning, depending on where you install and if it reaches shower or bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: ACeducator

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy -
customer_reviews.text: Great product - I had the toilet seat bidet which was good but over time the attachments to the seat cracked. And the nozzle gets really moldy. This product does the same great job of cleaning, but I can also fill mop buckets, and when I wash the shower I can spray down the walls for easy bathroom cleanup. It comes with everything you need and it feels solid and well built. I haven’t had any issues
customer_reviews.author: Michael F Estinville

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built unit which functions without leaks. There are multiple sources for this item under different brand names so be sure to look for the least expensive. One note though - my wife did not like how close the trigger was to the spray nozzle for sanitary reasons as compared a different brand that we previously owned.
customer_reviews.author: drb

customer_reviews.title: Gets the work done
customer_reviews.text: Almost straightforward installation. Got some leaks cause I was not using some of the included seals but once I figured that out it was ok. The side hook / holder does not work on the Bidet body so I end up dropping this more often than not as the fit on the hose is not tight. Also you have to get used to the cold water. That said, pressure is outstanding and you can regulate it with the trigger. Perfect purchase in these COVID times - my TP consumption has gone way down.
customer_reviews.author: ChazzB

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase my Wife has made in years !!!
customer_reviews.text: The whole covid thing had started and people were buying out the shelves of toilet paper... what did my wife do ??? Ordered a Bidet ... what did I do ??? Laughed !!! What am I doing now ??? Using a bidet every time I go and it has saved us so much in TP! Yes you still need some TP but Fellas... This thing works !
customer_reviews.author: Harley Procell

customer_reviews.title: Works great!! But after 6 months......
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After 6 months, the head started to leak. I've contacted Achiotely and all they can do is offer me back 1/2 the paid cost. - minus 2 stars from my original 5 stars review. Excellent quality bidet. Installation took less than 10 minutes. And no leaks from my system. Works as intended. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: CGN

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: Definitely nice to have when there's a run on tp at the store.
customer_reviews.author: james roberts

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bidet and I was a bit unsure of myself to install it but I skimmed the directions, placed the o-rings on, and tapped the ends - was easy breezy. The handle leaks if you don't push the handle all the way back - d'oh.
customer_reviews.author: emilee

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation!
customer_reviews.text: After failing to install an automatic bidet with a “one piece” toilet, I refuse to give up and got this handheld one instead. First of all one piece toilets are a complete pain in the a!!! The instructions that comes with the bidet is crap so just look up on YouTube. After following a video instruction on YouTube, this 36 weeks pregnant lady (me!), successfully installed this. Took about 15 minutes for me lol. So easy and easy to use and will recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bidet Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a toilet sprayer and i found this Achiotely bidet sprayer. And order it feb 4, i received the item in the timely manner. And the products works perfect. I install it myself .very easy took about 5 minutes. I went to youtube on how to install . I was w happy and use it all the time.. i really like it.works good. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: genevieve rhode

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install/changed my life.
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these at the start of Rona. It was really easy to install, and suddenly, I found wiping a disgusting way to clean oneself. So, I ordered a second one for my upstairs restroom. Second one was a little more difficult to get tight enough. Because you don’t want to over tighten and strip it, I suggest that you tighten the attachment, turn the water on. If it still leaks, turn it off and tighten a half turn. Keep doing this until any leak ceases.
customer_reviews.author: John Sloop

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install, Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and looks great! It’s very well packaged and comes with everything you need to install: from a wrench to plumbers tape. Have been looking for a bidet for awhile and this was the PERFECT choice. Well made, excellently packaged, and comes with easy to follow instructions. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: epsk

customer_reviews.title: Simple alternative to a bidet toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: Nice, all metal product and super easy to install - attaches to the connection on the bottom of the tank, not the wall. Our tank is rounded on the sides but the hook is still very sturdy. You can regulate the water pressure at the connection and slightly on the sprayer itself. The temperature of the water is what comes directly out of your pipes. Might be unpleasant in the winter if you live in a cold climate. I live in a warm climate so it is fine. We've used it for a couple of months now. No leaks (we used the included plumbers tape) and I don't know how we lived without it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hall

customer_reviews.title: Diaper sprayer, just get the SprayPal brand.
customer_reviews.text: I’m fairly handy, or at least adept in YouTubing to figure things out, but I had a hard time installing. The directions were confusing with the washers and it kept leaking. Finally I must have toggled the t-valve in just the right way that it stopped leaking (after the plumber’s tape didn’t work), so I am skeptical that it will continue to not leak. Time will tell. It works well though once installed. I purchased this for a diaper sprayer and in retrospect, I should’ve just paid a little extra for the SprayPal brand instead of this crappy off-brand company.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit our toilet
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Didn’t fit our toilet. Too bad. I was so looking forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: ShopsAlot

customer_reviews.title: High quality materials, nice packaging
customer_reviews.text: This is high quality sprayer set, it's well package and it comes with everything needed for the installation; it even includes some spares. The installation was a breeze, it only took a few minutes. Job well done to the manufacturer!
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: It dose not fit all toilet lines 😩
customer_reviews.text: I tried to install multiple time it does not fit my water lines it just leaks water everywhere, It seems easy to install but the screw to the tank squirts water all over the place I even had some try to come and install it and they said the line does not fit waste of money and time
customer_reviews.author: destinee

customer_reviews.title: Beware of rust from this unit!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this unit about 40 days ago... there is RUST forming on the bracket holding the sprayer onto the toilet tank. Not sure why, but the rust is spreading on top of porcelain tank which the bracket in attached to. Good product but disappointed in this rust thing. NRD response from company yet.... oh well. Be careful about this one, may need to get a stainless steel bracket, or live with rusty toilet tank!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Will iam

customer_reviews.title: Diaper wash and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like this toilet sprayer because it is the best way to wash baby diapers. with the touch of a button, you can control the water pressure and provide you with more healthier personal life. Use this handheld sprayer you can not only save toilet paper but also save a lot of toilet paper costs. Another advantage is that the kit contains all the mounting kit components fro wall mounting kit or toilet installation. It make life more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: tony H

customer_reviews.title: It’s all about the threads
customer_reviews.text: I had to squeeze into the tight place between the wall and toilet to look up at the bottom of the toilet bowl to FINALLY get the connection onto the toilet thread. The thread on the toilet seems to be different than the threads on the toilet connection. Had to get just right and the female finally went on to the male Toilet connection. Everything was easy accept that and once I got into the correct position to feed it on, worked really well. I’m proud to have a bidet. The bidet handle is beautiful and hangs in the toilet bowl real nice. Definitely work the $31 bucks and my time to install. A very nice diy home improvement investment!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Wright

customer_reviews.title: As clean as you can get...
customer_reviews.text: All this time here in USA, it was about time that I pushed the button to purchase a bidet system. The choices are endless and I wanted something which is flexible and works for everyone and this one hits the right spot. It took about 10 minutes to install, pressure flow is adjustable, the quality is sturdy and no leaks (fingers crossed) so it does seem like it was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: In order to properly install you have to have a bendable hose. We had to buy a braided hose from Lowe’s to properly install. Great pressure/flow. Be careful squeezing too hard, the force will cause it to splash out everywhere. This would be great for rinsing cloth diapers as well. Wish I would have had this particular one when I cloth diapered!
customer_reviews.author: Nikita H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: After living in Asia where most toilets have this, I realized that I wanted one but didn't know where to get one, later to find this one for a good price on Amazon! It was really simple to install and works great. This is really good for environment as you use little to no toilet paper, and you feel cleaner. I know if you don't grow up with one it seems a bit odd at first, but once you get used to it you're not gonna go back.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and pretty solidly made
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea BUT it would be nice to have a rotating head or other so you can change from spray to shower. Otherwise, on full blast you can damage your butt. Only way to have a nice gentle rinse is to close the water flow under the tank until you get the desired amount of water
customer_reviews.author: ARD

customer_reviews.title: Hello Cleanliness!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how/why I didn't switch to a bidet sooner. I have never felt so clean! This Bidet by Achiotely is fantastic. I have NO mechanical/construction/handy skills but this was a breeze to install. Everything I needed was right in the box. I have it hanging right on my toilet tank, and use it every time. There are varying pressures depending how much you want/prefer, although here is your warning if you press it all the way its very strong! I am thinking to purchase a second one for my other bathroom..THIS IS A MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Suhad Awad

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: This has drastically reduced the amount of toilet paper we use. This was easy to install. Based on the review's I didn't mess around when installing and used the plumbers tape for every connection. 3 weeks and no leaks. Works great and feels good on a hot summer day.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy althof

customer_reviews.title: great quality and valve
customer_reviews.text: Initial impressions are high quality materials and easy installation. No leaks and love the shut-off valve. Pro tip for everyone, leave the valve off, only turn on when in use, then return to off. That way if a leak ever develops, it won't make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: TrueStory

customer_reviews.title: We love this product for baby AND us
customer_reviews.text: We like this product for cleaning cloth diapers, and personal hygiene. Was easy to mount to toilet. Have not had any problems with it for over a month use. Only thing is you have to turn on and off after each use and for is that is near the back side of the toilet. It is not really a big deal
customer_reviews.author: nw360

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described on the listing. Could feel the good quality metal as soon as I held it. Super easy to install, leak proof joints with the teflon tape that was supplied. Recommended for people who come from tropical/warmer climates as the use of water based bidets are popular there. Overall I'm happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Yashesh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy for me to install. A bit of a pain working in such a small place. I haven't used it much yet - it's going to take a little while to get the right technique. Easy to adjust the pressure by how far you turn on the valve. Also works great to keep the toilet clean.
customer_reviews.author: Pam C.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful product, easy to install and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this sprayer for my parents who are visiting us soon. They are 60 plus and I am very hopeful that this sprayer will make their life easy. The installation was very smooth and got it working within 10 mins. No extra tools needed. Everything required came within box. They had spare washers and one plumber tape which I did not use but it was very thoughtful they included it in case some joints were leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Sweta

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it!
customer_reviews.text: Very useful tool. Growing up in South East Asia, I've always used this my entire life before moving to the U.S. where you wipe your behind with toilet paper. This is the case in my other developed countries as well. But to me that's very disturbing and also disgusting. Then I found this product FINALLY! THANKS to the internet and the company who made this.
customer_reviews.author: Syed Ishrak

customer_reviews.title: Seems good, not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works well but does not sit well in the little holder. Set-up is easy but lacks enough instruction- comes w two rubber gaskets but instructions mention 1 or 3 depending on your interpretation. Could be So much easier/quicker to set up if they just included some diagrams re gaskets.
customer_reviews.author: Whisperer whisperer

customer_reviews.title: i finally have my bidet!!
customer_reviews.text: i am so happy about my bidet. would you believe, i installed it all by myself? i have rheumatoid arthritis and my fingers are deformed, yet was able to install my bidet all by myself. my kids and grandkids are so proud of me. i absolutely love my bidet.
customer_reviews.author: maryam

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not easy to install. It came with a booklet that said less than 10 minutes to install with no tools required and it took more than ten minutes and I was not able to install it. In addition, it damaged my plumbing and I had to call a plumber out.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install (YMMV), adjustable water pressure
customer_reviews.text: *This honest review is part of the promotion offered by seller* Package comes with everything I needed, even a small Teflon plumbing tape and small wrench. Installation could have been a lot easier (like 5-10 minutes) if I had more space behind my toilet. Material is good, matching color with my existing hardware is a bonus. No leak, so far. One important feature is the water flow is adjustable through the T valve. I wish the hanger (to hang the head on toilet bowl) is adjustable and the latch/ unlatch is smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Nickz109

customer_reviews.title: Very responsive customer service
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I love how the customer service deal with any issue . I like the material but it did not assemble pretty good in my bathroom for a pipe issue which I don’t know .Again Ms. Ann was so responsive to customer service and professional too. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Snow

customer_reviews.title: I love this.
customer_reviews.text: A great purchase . My hubby installed it and it was very easy. Not only do we use it for cleaning up after a visit to the potty, we use it to rinse things off in the tub. Looking to get another one for our down stairs bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice M. Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Best for the butt with useful added features not expected
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Added bonus is that it's a great weapon to use to clean the toilet and the shower/tub. Takes a little getting used to for a first time water user after decades of paper use however but it's so much better for the butt.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mendes

customer_reviews.title: Best thing to buy for the toilet
customer_reviews.text: Life-saver! I grew up using bidet and it’s sad that it is not standard to have these here in US. Need to install every time we move. It is very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Git

customer_reviews.title: Missing rubber washer
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I'd like the seller to send me the rubber washer my the equipment was missing. The directions do not say to buy a washer, so i assume that mine was just missing the washer that connects the T-valve to the toilet. The 2 extra washers that are included go with the hose and are far too small to use inside the T-valve. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Eva Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: If I had known, I would have purchased years ago!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after having bowel surgery and “issues”. I had a professional plumber install the unit and including his labor it was under $175.00. It works easily and well. I do not mind the cold water as I had feared. It will pay for itself in less than a year in reducing toilet paper costs, and I feel much cleaner in general. Americans need to catch up to the European way in this regard.
customer_reviews.author: fereshteh hale

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: After getting so many things lately that are sub-quality ~it was really refreshing to get a product that actually is AMAZING Quality. Pretty easy to install and works great. Obviously the water is cold as there is no heater on the unit but for the price ~ I'm good with that!
customer_reviews.author: B SandyKay

customer_reviews.title: NOT for skirted toilets
customer_reviews.text: Probably my fault for not checking if this would fit a skirted toilet, certainly not as-is and even after multiple trips to the hardware store to try and DIY a solution... its a no go. I gave it to my friend with a non-skirted toilet to try since my return window had closed by this point, and the gasket in the toilet connection started to leak. If you have a regular toilet, I'm sure this would be a piece of cake to install and use, though I'm really unsure about the gasket problem ( maybe even more plumbers tape?). I just wanted a sparkling clean bum :(
customer_reviews.author: Erin Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great for female anatomy
customer_reviews.text: Switched out my 80 dollar tushy bidet for this because I mainly have a bidet go drastically cut down on UTIs the tushy one is good too but it’s better for your butt than your vulva, this one is great for both. Great for rinsing off during your period.
customer_reviews.author: ariel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Use so much less toilet paper and much cleaner too boot. There is some discoloration on the metal, flexible hose. Not sure why - its in the middle of the hose. That's the only thing from a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Leggett

customer_reviews.title: You will wonder why you didn’t learn of this sooner.
customer_reviews.text: After traveling to Qatar and using this method while visiting the Middle East, and due to the run on toilet paper from COVID-19, I ordered this handheld bidet. Installation was simple, the learning curve fast and it simply works very well. You will wonder why you didn’t learn of this sooner. It will save a lot of money on toilet paper and saves your septic system from unnecessary solids.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Winter

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Not only cleans your bumm but I use it to rinse out the toilet when cleaning. It's a cool relief when that hot spicy Mexican dish you had yesterday needs to be left behind but comes out as hot as when it went over your tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Solid metal build. Not plastic like other cheap ones
customer_reviews.text: I like the tubing, it feels easy to bend compared to the vinyl kinds that are hard to bend and maneuver. The handle is solid metal so it feels solid and hefty. The lever is easy to press also. Very good metal quality overall.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Be careful before buy
customer_reviews.text: It was not fit ny system.Ng system was regular made of hose connectors.When you buy this you need ti change uour whole entire system.Yoh cannot adapt it to your connectors.Befor buy it be carefull
customer_reviews.author: J.Whitestone

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The bidet is of very good quality. It was easy to install. I installed it myself and it has not leaked in the past month or so. You can set the water pressure as well which is great. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ali H

customer_reviews.title: Nice accessory
customer_reviews.text: I cobbled together a similar unit like this from a kitchen sprayer. This is much better. The instructions could be clearer but if you have some basic plumbing knowledge, it is fairly easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Fred R.

customer_reviews.title: Great bidet AND diaper sprayer.
customer_reviews.text: We use this as a bidet as well as a diaper sprayer for cloth diapers and it works perfectly for both! I also really like that it rests on the toilet because the last one we used had to be attached to the wall, which is not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: MrsHojo4

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and a cinch to install
customer_reviews.text: bidet works great. It was very easy to install (and I am 84 yrs old). I will use it mostly to keep my sink clean and not stop up as it tends to do wash out my toilet. Best of all, you can adjust the pressure just like you need it..
customer_reviews.author: J. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great for cloth diapering!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for cloth diapering, and it was the best idea ever! Easy to hook up to the toilet, and I bought the splatter shield to go along with it. This makes everything so much easier and more sanitary. No need to use your hands and dunk the diaper in the toilet or trying to use a shower head to clean it off into a bucket. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Feeling clean.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted a bidet, but I thought they were supposed to be difficult to install. That’s definitely not the case. This bidet was easy to install. I love having this product. So much easier to clean up and feel fresh throughout the day. Good quality stream. Not too strong or weak. I’d definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

product_meta.title: Achiotely Handheld Bidet Toilet Sprayer, Stainless Steel Bathroom Bidet Sprayer Set, Baby Cloth Diaper Sprayer, Reduce The Toilet Paper, Easy to Install
feature_bullets: Healthy Water Pressure: Control the water pressure through buttons to achieve more thorough cleanliness and bring you a healthier personal life.
Environmental protection: With this handheld bidet spray, you can save a lot of toilet paper, not only for the natural environment, but also save your money for toilet paper.
Multiple uses: A simple bathroom spray kit set, which brings more convenience to your life. It can not only be clean body, but also can be used as diaper sprayer.
Simple Installation: The suite contains all the installation group components, no plumber, easy DIY, two installation methods (Wall or Toilet Mount)
Friendly Customer Service: If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us through Amazon email. We will solve the problem for you within 24 hours.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,725 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
